palpitada.title: Palpitada
palpitada.description: Led frontend development for real-time prediction markets platform serving thousands of users. Optimized Next.js build performance by 94% (17kâ†’1k modules), architected complex state management for financial transactions using Redux Toolkit, and mentored engineering team on modern TypeScript patterns. Integrated REST/GraphQL APIs and implemented comprehensive error handling for mission-critical features.

themizer.title: Themizer
themizer.description: Architected and developed open-source TypeScript CLI tool that transforms CSS utility classes into type-safe design tokens. Implemented OKLCH color space manipulation for automatic palette expansion, achieved 88% CSS size reduction through custom base-52 minification, and built framework detection for Next.js, Remix, and Vite with real-time file watching. Published to npm with comprehensive Jest test coverage.
themizer.company: Open Source - Design Token System for Scalable CSS Architecture

mentalyc.title: Mentalyc App
mentalyc.description: Built accessible component library for mental health SaaS platform with full WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. Implemented Storybook documentation system and established accessibility testing workflows. Collaborated with design team to improve user flows and implement responsive design patterns using Tailwind CSS.

polkamarkets.title: Polkamarkets App
polkamarkets.description: Contributed to major platform redesign (v2 launch) and improved application performance by 15% through asset optimization and CSS refactoring. Introduced Jest unit testing framework and established component documentation standards, improving developer velocity across the engineering team. Implemented social authentication integration and optimized homepage rendering.

ainotator.title: AINotator Web
ainotator.description: Implemented interactive image annotation system using Fabric.js for semantic segmentation data capture. Built custom brush and polygon drawing tools with responsive design and COCO format data export functionality. Integrated with AI vision systems for industrial applications.
ainotator.company: Overview AI - Next-Gen AI Industrial Vision Systems

vitalk.title: Vitalk Portal
vitalk.description: Owned QR-code onboarding UI implementation for user migration project, building responsive React components and collaborating with design team. Contributed to design system refactor that improved developer productivity by 10% through centralized design tokens and standardized component patterns.
vitalk.company: Vitalk - Online Emotional Health Solutions Provider

bepro.title: Bepro App
bepro.description: Implemented responsive pages for task marketplace platform using React with Bootstrap. Integrated authentication flows, REST APIs, and improved application performance up to 15% through code optimization techniques. Contributed to frontend architecture and component standards.

ufal.title: UFAL 60 Years
ufal.description: Led frontend development for Virtual Exhibition platform showcasing university's 60-year history, built with React and Material UI serving thousands of visitors. Conducted user research and designed user flows for medical record system. Managed project from concept through deployment.
ufal.company: UFAL - Higher Education Institution in Alagoas, Brazil
